Version history

How to archive a version of the ptototype.

  • v1.0.0 - 8 July 2024

    MVP Spec

    Main changes to comparator set journey:

    • Move away from talking about 'comparator sets'
    • Change to having a 'basket' rather than updating the set on every change
    • Added 'updating' loading screen
    • Iteration of labels surrounding phase/establishment/category etc
    • Removed district/ward options
    • Moved away from multiple screens to having more on one page to allow easier back-and-forth changes
    • Separated into default and additional characteristics
    • Change to previewing set before creating
    • Change to showing the values of the selected characteristics when previewing
    • New layout to show the selected characteristic values

  • v0.2.0 - 19 March 2024

    Added characteristic-based comparator set generation

  • v0.1.0 - 8 March 2024

    Added name-only comparator set creation
